person.persName: Rodophil E. Jeter (Provost Marshal of Campbellsville, Taylor County)

body.p: Residence: Campbellsville, Taylor County, KY. A Kentucky-born house joiner. Son of Anderson Jeter and Sorrow S. Allen. Married Sarah A. (aka Martha A.?) Provost Marshal of Campbellsville during the Civil War. Captain of Company C, 13th KY Volunteer Infantry. Mustered in 31 Dec 1861, Camp Hobson, KY. Mustered out 19 Apr 1862. Resigned. Father of John J. Jeter.
